Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The estimated cumulative risk of breast cancer reached 28 % ( 95 % CI 9 % - 44 % ) by age 50 years and 84 % ( 95 % CI 43 % - 95 % ) by age 70 years .

Let's think step by step.

1. The first disease entity mentioned in the paragraph is "breast cancer." This is the condition for which the cumulative risk is being estimated.

There are no other disease entities mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
